text: "The Kill" (written as The Kill (Bury Me)) is the second single off of American rock band Thirty Seconds to Mars' second studio album A Beautiful Lie. The song was released on April 10, 2006. The song was able to make it to #1 on the Alternative Airplay, #1 on the Mainstream Rock, #3 on the Adult Top 40, #60 on the Mainstream Top 40, and #60 on the Billboard Hot 100 charts. The song was certified 2Ã— Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The song won Best Single at the 2007 Kerrang! Awards. Vocalist Jared Leto said about the song: "It's really about a relationship with yourself. It's about confronting your fear and confronting the truth about who you are."Thirty Seconds to Mars A Beautiful Lie CD/DVD Making of The Kill music video - Jared Leto & Matt Wachter talk about the song's meaning. A music video for the song was released. The music video pays tribute to the 1980 movie The Shining. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2006 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Thirty Seconds to Mars songs
title: The Kill
